product.title: Cotswold Deluxe Oyster - Venetian Blind
product.description: In a creamy ivory tone, the cotswold deluxe in oyster parades a subtly sheen paint on wide, sturdy slats with matching components. For flexible light, ventilation, and privacy, simply tilt the slats to your desired degree. Invite country sophistication into your home by teaming the oyster with vintage pinks and an accenting sage green in the master bedroom. Include light, naked woods and dreamy florals, dressing the bed linen with plush chenille throws and cushions for an added touch of luxe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Valencia French Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru, whatever you call it, it's a very nice neutral shade that adds just enough colour to the window. This colourway is beautiful in both modern settings and homes that favour this valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee.

relproducts.title: Rimini Dove - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rich simplicity of the rimini in dove is all you need for any room. Neither dark nor light, it allows just a little light to penetrate, and provides you with the privacy you need, when you need it. And this resilient, quality blind will last you well, year upon year. There aren't many colours or styles that the moderating monochrome of the dove won't work with. Set off bright reds, complement deep purples, or tame dazzling limes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Almond - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini almond is a classic, creamy white offering that's sure to add a touch of elegance to any room. Its fine texture makes it soft to the touch, yet it retains the durability typical of the rimini range. Combine with bold patterns for effortless period chic, or with browns, beiges, and golds for a modern, opulent look. The almond's luxurious finish will particularly suit a living room or bedroom where relaxing is the main goal, but of course would work well in any room amongst most colour schemes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Cream - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: By embracing the simple things in life rimini cream brings you a little touch of luxury right where you need it as you craft your interiors to reflect who you really are. A delicately woven fabric plays host to the rich and calming nature of cream as your mind drifts off to your own personal oasis. Cream works in any room where you want to add that gentle homely touch that brings the rest of your decor together.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Smoke Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm smoke blue is a soft blue shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm smoke blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Dove Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm dove grey is a light soft grey shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm dove grey roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

relproducts.title: Genesis Plain Luxe Soft Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The genesis plain luxe cream offers a simple and stylish enhancement for your windows. This practical roller blind is designed with convenience in mind. Whatever room you hang this blind will also benefit from the dimout effect and uplifting cream colourway that will give the space a bright splash of warmth whatever time of day. Product id: db-rbx1947 fabric colour: soft cream material: 100% polyester lining: colour match polyester backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes genesis plain luxe soft cream roller blind in cream.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Pebble Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Cotswold pebble grey is the epitome of modern style blended in perfect harmony with a classic look. The finely poised slats sit proudly in your window space whilst the contemporary pebble grey takes pride of place in even the most modern home. Adding smaller features to the living room like a side lamp and coasters in pebble grey is a great way to create a subtle secondary layer to your decor. Keep the main colours to rich creams and lightly coloured woods and you'll see your favourite new colour really come to the fore.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Monroe Bisque - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The creamy hue of cotswold monroe bisque is the perfect backdrop you need to create the relaxing and homely atmosphere you'll never want to leave. With a gentle colour that adorns every finely cut slat you'll be able to put your feet up with the peace of mind that you can rest without being disturbed. We love the idea of pairing monroe bisque with a matching rug on a lightly stained floor or a modern laminate floor.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The matt, chalky finish of the cotswold in cosmic white is right on trend, and will work amidst a range of decor schemes. A matching wooden pelmet and bottom rail give this blind a streamlined edge, with no obtrusive detailing detracting from its effect. Perfect for a shabby chic theme in a light, vintage bedroom, the cosmic white will look stunning against sweet duck egg walls. Include pretty floral patterns in the room, whether in the bedlinen or accenting cushions, and don't be afraid to add a complementary shade of pink for extra depth.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Cotswold silverton grey brings a refreshingly elegant shade into your home by really bringing your window spaces to life. The finely crafted slats allow you to celebrate the way the light dances with the exquisite finish to create a regal aesthetic that is a joy to behold. Turn the upstairs landing into the epitome of understated style by adding silverton grey to your existing decor. Pair it with a matching lampshade and a canvas print to create a homely feel in one of the harder spaces to decorate in the home.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Ghost White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Light and unassuming, the cotswold ghost white is a matt painted blind, comprising of thick, sturdy slats, a strong pelmet and headrail, and a matching bottom rail and acorns. And, treated well for protection, you can be sure that this blind won't warp or crack in use. For a fresh and inviting look in a country kitchen, couple the ghost white with a lush apple green. Use the green on the walls and match matt white tiles to the blind, then accessorise with the two tones to your heart's content.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: In light, country cream, with a trendy, chalk finish, the cotswold's oatmeal is a pretty and neutral choice. The matt paint makes this blind unobtrusive yet inherently attractive, an effect that is only added to by its coordinating pieces and parts. Partner the oatmeal with a lush sky blue in a child's bedroom, where the pale tone of the blind will allow cute patterns and fun characters on bedlinen and wall hangings to stand out on their own.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Pretty and subtle, the cotswold in dove grey has satin finish, with the faintest of sheens and a detectable wood grain aesthetic and texture. The paint colour is a pale grey, perfect for either contemporary or vintage settings. For a sweet and romantic pastel colour palette, group the dove grey with pale pinks and soft lilacs. Choose one for the walls, or paint opposite walls in each, then furnish the room with painted white or matching grey pieces.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Marble Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Matt grey, and with matching components, the cotswold in marble grey combines the contemporary with shabby chic, due to its lovely, chalky finish. Sustainable as well as stylish, this blind offers bags of practicality with its heavy duty headrail and thick, durable slats. Construct a feeling of country vintage chic in the dining room by combining the marble grey with a painted white dining table and cute grey and pink accessories.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Soft Grey Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The lightness of the grey in this fabric is a versatile, neutral look that's a dream for both modern homes and rustic schemes, so it's a versatile piece. The major appeal though is in the fabric itself, a tactile and soft weave that you'll almost want to wrap around yourself and the lightness of the grey in this fabric is a versatile, neutral look that's a dream for both modern homes and rustic schemes, so it's a versatile piece.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Ebony - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Cotswold ebony allows you to take modern decor in an exciting new direction with its unique blend of contemporary colour and classic form. With a slight satin finish sitting against a backdrop of natural light you'll gain a new appreciation for the finer things in life. Turn the master bedroom into your own little oasis away from it all with a little help from cotswold ebony. By opting for crisp white sheets and a selection of ebony scatter cushions, and a matching rug, you'll be able to transform your room in a single afternoon.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: With the faint sheen of its satin paint, the cotswold in smoke grey places a pale grey tone on thick wooden slats, which are treated to prevent cracking and warping, ensuring that this blind will stand the test of time. A matching pelmet, rails, and acorns provide a sleek and unobstructed appearance. Fashion a plain bedroom into a trendy, up-to-date designer haven by pitting the smoke grey against sunny primrose yellow walls.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Oyster - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Bring a subtle sense of class to your home by blending in the cotswold in oyster, a painted, satin-finish venetian blind with a beautiful cream tone. Its luxe colour even stretches to its included accessories, such as the wooden pelmet and bottom rail. For a bright and summery vibe, all year round, pair the oyster with pretty coral hues, in varying tones. Paint a window wall in the master bedroom a bold and vivacious coral, and accent matching cream bedlinen with coral-toned cushions and throws.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Deluxe Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Coated in a gently glistening satin paint, the costwold deluxe in dove grey is comprised of thick slats, a heavy duty headrail, and coordinating ladder tapes. The slats are easily adjustable to allow as much light, privacy, and ventilation as you choose. Partner the dove grey with soft whites in a nursery to produce a soothing, tranquil atmosphere perfect for a small infant. Add gentle prints featuring sweet animal characters and polka dots, including the occasional hint of subtle colour here and there.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Deluxe Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The cotswold deluxe in smoke grey is aptly named, with its high quality slats and matching components, including woven linen ladder ribbons for streamlined appeal. The slats are easily adjusted, allowing you to let in as much or as little light and air as you need. Build a stunningly unusual decor scheme in your home office by setting the smoke grey against a navy blue feature wall. Paint the remaining walls in white or matching pale grey and furnish the room with grey furniture and navy accessories.

relproducts.title: Origin Magnolia - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The queen of neutrality, the magnolia version of their origin aluminium range is a simple choice that will match almost any colour it's paired with. Its satin finish and colour-coordinated cords provide it with a streamlined look that only the best of neutrals can achieve. If you love colour-blocking and continuation, go as far as setting the magnolia amongst matching magnolia walls, resulting in a clean, aerodynamic feel in a living room, hallway, or kitchen.

relproducts.title: Wood Grain Effect 25mm Golden Oak Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Golden oak wood grain effect 25mm aluminium venetian blinds are a light to mid brown wooden shade. This colour will look fabulous with elegant creams and neutrals within the home or office. Product id: db-dven0378 fabric colour: golden oak s25065 material: aluminium headrail: co-ordinating slimline aluminium headrail - face or top fix brackets slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: cord & wand energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes wood grain effect 25mm golden oak aluminium venetian in brown.

relproducts.title: Turin 25mm Gloss Cream Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Their range of turin 25mm aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A warm tone, this jersey cream venetian blind adds a warm light cream shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us which is why not only is this venetian blind made by their team of experts, but it also comes with a free five year guarantee.
